titleStmt.title: Mercurius vapulans, or, Naworth stript and vvhipt. In answer to a most base and scandalous pamphlet, called Mercurio Cœlico-Mastix, or an anti-caveat, &c. Sent abroad from Oxford, under the name of G. Naworth. In opposition to Mercurius Cœlicus, or a caveat to all the people of the kingdom; lately penned by Mr. John Booker. By Timotheus Philo-Bookerus.
titleStmt.author: Timotheus Philo-Bookerus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to Order for I. F.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in the imprint date is crossed out and altered to "1643".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
